original_text: So the two disciples went to the village. They did everything that Jesus had told them to do.
korean_text: 제자들이 가서 예수께서 명하신 대로 하여

sentences.original_text: So the two disciples went to the village.
that Jesus had told them to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 그들에게 하라고 말씀하신 모든 것을.
